'''Beta 1.21.100.24''' (ChromeOS, Android), '''Preview 1.21.100.24''' (Windows, Xbox, PlayStation) or '''Preview 1.21.100.25''' (iOS, iPadOS) is the fifth and final beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.100]], released on July 16, 2025,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/38103347836557-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-100-24|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.100.24|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=July 16, 2025}}</ref> which fixes some bugs.

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''Graphical'''
*Added a new [[Screen effects|camera effect]] when facing and climbing blocks such as [[ladder]]s and [[vine]]s, to reduce eye strain and improve accessibility.
*[[Sugar cane]] blocks will now become slightly transparent when the camera passes through them.
*[[Item (entity)|Items]] dropped in first person view appear slightly higher, without affecting the actual item position.
